body.p:
9th Nov 1861
To his Exelency
Govr McGoffin

Your Petioner hereby States that he has been fined Seven Dollars and 50/100 for a breach of the Peace in a difficulty with Mr Wm KCavenaugh which occured on last saturday evening and was brought on by sd Cavenaugh attempting to draw a weapon on me I was forced to strike him in self defense the above statement was proven on the trial. The blow was struck by me without malice or forthought
Your petitioner would humbly ask you to releive him from the fine improsed on me
The undersigned join in the above petition

Jas. P. OHara
H. Hardie
B. F. Johnson
P. Joyce
Jno. N. Major
Hugh Leonard
W. R. Robinson
J. W. South
T. Callaghan
